perception: DC 10 + 1/2 Ranger level + Wisdom bonus (-2 if mechanical)
name: Alarm Trap* (Ex or Su)
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Ranger/Ranger Traps/Alarm Trap* (Ex or Su)
effect: When the trap is triggered, it also creates a momentary loud noise equivalent to the audible alarm version of alarm.
disable_device: DC 10 + 1/2 Ranger level + Wisdom bonus (-2 if mechanical)
